Package ibis.cashmere.constellation

Cashmere is a library on top of Constellation that schedules Many-Core Levels (MCL) kernels efficiently.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DeInitLibraryFunction
    Represents a method to deinitialize an OpenCL library.
    InitLibraryFunction
    Represents a method to initialize an OpenCL library.
    LaunchFunction
    Represents a method to launch a library function LibFunc.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Argument
    A class used for indicating directions of arguments to kernels.
    Buffer
    A wrapper of a ByteBuffer.
    BufferCache
    A wrapper for ByteBufferCache.
    Cashmere
    The entry point to the Cashmere library.
    Device
    Class that represents a many-core Device.
    Kernel
    A Kernel represents an MCL kernel.
    KernelLaunch
    Represents one specific launch of a Kernel .
    Launch
    The abstract base class for KernelLaunch and LibFuncLaunch that contains shared code.
    LibFunc
    A LibFunc represents an entry point to an OpenCL library.
    LibFuncLaunch
    Represents one specific launch of a LibFunc.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Argument.Direction
    The Direction enumeration contains constants for arguments.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CashmereException
    A general Cashmere exception.
    CashmereNotAvailable
    An exception that indicates that Cashmere is not available.
    LibFuncNotAvailable
    An exception that indicates that the library is not available.

Package ibis.cashmere.constellation Description

Cashmere is a library on top of Constellation that schedules Many-Core Levels (MCL) kernels efficiently. While Constellation is responsible for scheduling Activities onto nodes in the cluster, Cashmere operates on the level of one node. It is responsible for scheduling many-core kernels efficiently to many-core devices in the node, such as GPUs. The main class for a Cashmere program is Cashmere that only has static methods. For a typical setup of Cashmere we refer to the Cashmere class.
See Also:
Cashmere, Constellation, Many-Core Levels (MCL)
